rawContent:
In the coming weeks, you might hear that a trans streamer has been accused of "grooming minors".

This rumor originated on an infamous hate forum. 

What the streamer *actually* did is offer trans teens info about going on HRT - to the forum, this is synonymous with grooming.

On the flip side when you provide gay teens with material on safe gay sex, it's GROOMING.

When you introduce pronouns in class, its GROOMING.

When you provide spaces for gender exploration for youth, its GROOMING.
